wikipedia_page.main: William McKay (Misspelt as McKie) (1886–1956) was a British wrestler who competed in the 1908 Summer Olympics. In 1908, at the 1908 Summer Olympics, he won the bronze medal in the freestyle wrestling featherweight class.
